text: 1:13 Aposel 3:17; 8:3; 9:4-5; 1 Korin 15:9-10; Galesia 1:13Guizbangɨra, fomɨra kɨ dɨbovir akabar an ziam gasɨghasɨki, egha an apanim gamuava, akar kurabar a mɨkeme. Ezɨ a fo, kɨ deragha a gɨfozir puvatɨgha, nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an itir puvatɨ, egha arazir kabagh ami. Kamaghɨn amizɨma, a nan apangkufi.
